item.title: EU adds Iran's Revolutionary Guards to terrorist list
item.description: EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas says the move is a response to Tehran's deadly crackdown on protesters.

item.title: Heavy gunfire and blasts heard near airport in Niger's capital
item.description: The airport houses an air force base and is about 10km (six miles) from the presidential place.

item.title: US Senator Amy Klobuchar announces bid for Minnesota governor
item.description: She fills the void for Democrats after current Governor Tim Walz ended his re-election campaign early.

item.title: Ukraine receives 1,000 bodies in latest soldier swap with Russia
item.description: Russia received 38 soldiers' bodies in exchange as part of an agreement between the warring countries.

item.title: Nicki Minaj calls herself Trump's 'number one fan' and shows off gold card visa
item.description: The rapper, born in Trinidad and Tobago, praises the US president while Bruce Springsteen protests aboout ICE.
